app_name: Groups Control Groups Photo and Video Editing Apps Short Art Photo Video Editor
app_description: Creative effects and filters for photos and videos: VHS Stardust Retro Golden Hour. Retro vintage or Indie Kid find your own aesthetic! Take your photography to the next level with free presets. Easily import and edit your RAW photos. Use editing tools like Contrast and Saturation to make your photos pop or use Grain and Fade to add texture and mimic analog film effects. Adjust or play around with your photo perspectives with Crop and Skew. Save and recreate your favorite edits with Recipes. Create and edit videos with our easy to use video editor Adjust white balance and experiment with color control with HSL. Take your IG Stories TikToks Reels to the next level. Crop video clips to the perfect dimensions and ratios. Try Glitch video effects and other trendy filters in the video editor. Trim videos. Add your best moments to a video collage Show your best moments in the coolest possible way! Short Art Pro Subscription Join Short Art Pro to access all Features. Payment will be charged to your iTunes account at confirmation of purchase. Subscriptions will automatically renew unless auto renew is turned off at least 24 hours before the end of the current period. Your account will be charged for renewal in accordance with your plan within 24 hours prior to the end of the current period. You can manage or turn off auto renew in your Apple ID account settings any time after purchase.
